description: Python can be used for everything from web development to software development and data science applications.
Machine learning has become more and more integrated into our lives. It is the branch of AI that powers chatbots etc.
An operating system serves as a link between the user and the device's hardware. It is responsible for all functions of the system.
JavaScript is one of the leading names when it comes to front-end web development. Moreover, it is one of the best programming languages
An algorithm is a well-defined computational procedure that takes some value as input and generates some value as output.
Data Structures covers the implementation and analysis of data structures for sequences, queues, priority queues .
